Actions.Name: Create a campaign
Actions.Description: This action will create a Campaign.

Actions.Name: Get contacts from a list
Actions.Description: This action will retrieve all contacts from a list.

Actions.Name: Create a contact
Actions.Description: This action will create a contact.

Actions.Name: Upload an image
Actions.Description: This action will upload an image to the PoliteMail server.

Actions.Name: Add emails to a list
Actions.Description: This action allows you to add contacts to a PoliteMail list by email address.

Actions.Name: Create a list
Actions.Description: This action allows you to create a list.

Actions.Name: Remove emails from list
Actions.Description: This action allows you to remove contacts from a PoliteMail list by email address.

Actions.Name: When there is a new contact
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new contact is created

Actions.Name: Send a message
Actions.Description: This allows you to send a tracked message using PoliteMail.

Actions.Name: Upload a SmartAttachment
Actions.Description: This action allows you to upload a file as a Smart Attachment.

Actions.Name: Create a template
Actions.Description: This action allows you to create a template.
